name: querychat-dependencies
description: JavaScript dependencies for querychat code editor

scripts.copy-deps: npm run copy-core && npm run copy-languages && npm run copy-extensions && npm run copy-themes
scripts.copy-core: cpy 'node_modules/prism-code-editor/dist/*.js' pkg-r/inst/js/prism-code-editor/ && cpy 'node_modules/prism-code-editor/dist/*.css' pkg-r/inst/js/prism-code-editor/ && cpy 'node_modules/prism-code-editor/dist/utils/*.js' pkg-r/inst/js/prism-code-editor/utils/ && cpy 'node_modules/prism-code-editor/dist/prism/**/*.js' pkg-r/inst/js/prism-code-editor/prism/
scripts.update-deps: npm run install-deps && npm run copy-deps
